subtitle: An all-in-one recipe that children can do - with a little help from an adult.

method.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Line a 12-hole muffin tin with paper muffin cases.

To make the muffins, flour, sugar, cocoa and baking powder into a large bowl. Mix the butter, milk, eggs and vanilla together and stir into the flour mixture. Beat until the mixture is just smooth - do not overbeat.
Spoon the mixture into the paper cases and bake for 20-25 min or until risen and firm to the touch. Cool on a wire rack.
To decorate, beat the icing sugar and butter together. Blend the cocoa and water to a smooth paste and beat into the butter mix. Spread over the top of the muffins. Decorate with Easter eggs.

title: Easter egg cakes
